page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Every morning my dad gets me up at {7.00a.m,}I put on my slippers,dressing gown,wash my hands and then go down for breakfast.After breakfast i go back upstairs, wash my hands, clean my teeth, get dressed then go to see to the pets or do some violin practice. After that I play around with my brother until its{8.30}then our mum tells us us to get ready for school. When were all ready, mum says goodbye and we walk to school. I arrive at school at about{8.45}and join in with the playground games. At{3.30 p.m}I go home, when I get home I unpack my bag then watch telly. At{5.05}I have tea then play upstairs, at{6.30}we do our pets then play out, at{7.20}I go in and get ready for bed then I go down and have some drinking chocolate then I go to bed.
